name: Banana Gingerbread with Vanilla Glaze
author: Dianne
summary: Banana bread and gingerbread come together in this delicious recipe. It's a great way to use up those extra bananas during the holidays or wintertime. A thick vanilla glaze is the perfect finishing touch.
ingredients: ⅔ cup packed dark brown sugar
directions: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Spray a 9x5-inch loaf pan with cooking spray
Mash bananas in a large bowl with a fork
Add brown sugar, molasses, oil, eggs, and 1/4 cup milk
Stir flour, ginger, cinnamon, baking soda, cloves, allspice, and salt together in another bowl
Stir flour mixture into the banana mixture until just incorporated
Bake in the preheated oven until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, 60 to 70 minutes
Let cool completely, at least 30 minutes
Turn bread out of the pan
Combine 1 tablespoon milk, corn syrup, and butter in a bowl
Add vanilla extract and enough remaining milk to achieve a drizzling consistency
Pour glaze over the cooled bread
